summary: College student Charlie Banks has to face old problems when the bully he had an unpleasant encounter with back in high school shows up on his campus.
cast: Jesse Eisenberg|Jason Ritter|Chris Marquette|Eva Amurri Martino|Sebastian Stan|Gloria Votsis|Alex Guarino|Danny A. Abeckaser|Jason Anthony|Declan Baldwin|Emily Camara Boisseau|Dennis Boutsikaris|Miles Chandler|Jessica Conlan|Sam Daly|William DeCoff|Hunter Gallagher|Steven Hinkle|Olivia Keister|Cain Kerner|Nicholas Leiter Mele|Malcolm Morano|Charles Parnell|Patrick Pitu|Josh Richman|Denece Ryland|Jeremy Schwartz|Gabby Sherba|James Zimmerman|Matt Zuena|John Franchi|Domenic Fuggetta|Amanda George|Amy B. Hart|Courtney Eva Jones|Gabe Karon|Matthew O'Neill|Todd Poudrier|Vincent James Russo|Melanie Scalera|Ryan Shibley|Justin Sulham|Kal Thompson|Darya Zabinski
title: The Education of Charlie Banks
